status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

fields.description:
Application Error running
KS> Base UI> Views> Table Views> Insert Row
Click Insert Row Below
h5. Actual result
Application Error in table_view_row_insert.js
h5. Expected result
would be nice to have method 'insertRowAfter' implemented 
A new Row should be inserted below
fields.summary: KitchenSink: BlackBerry- "InsertRowAfter" method is not implemented

comments.body: Placing these items on hold for the moment based on community interest.
Closing ticket as BlackBerry is no longer supported by us.
